org.apache.flex.swf.io

Class SWFReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.io.SWFReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<ITag>, ISWFReader, ITagContainer

    public class SWFReader
extends Object
implements ISWFReader, ITagContainer
    Implementation of ISWFReader. This is a recursive-descent decoder of a SWF file. Error handling for malformed SWFs: 1. Catch RuntimeExceptions thrown by InputBitStream and report problems. 2. Handle errors in SWF tag bodies by logging problems and throwing MalformedTagExceptions. 3. Recover from #1 and #2 by throwing out the current tag and reading up to the start of the next tag.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      protected static class  SWFReader.TagHeader
      Wrapper class for "type" and "length" field in a SWF tag header.

      • readTag

        protected ITag readTag(SWFReader.TagHeader header)
                throws IOException
        Read a tag body. A "read boundary" is marked to the length of the tag to prevent invalid tag or incorrect decoding logic from contaminating the following tags or having left-over bytes after decoding a tag.
        Parameters:
        header - tag header
        Returns:
        tag model or null if the tag is invalid.
        Throws:
        IOException - error
